ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: A Lorentz model of an emission feature defined in Angstroms.

DESC.PARA: A Lorentz profile of an emission feature, where:

PARA.EQUATION: f(x) = flux * pos * fwhm / c / ([abs(x - pos)]**kurt + (pos * fwhm / c / 2)**2) / 6.283185308

DESC.PARA: where x has to be in Angstroms, kurt is set to 2 as a default value, and c is the speed of light.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
